name: 應用統計軟體分析
goals: Students will learn how to program in R
Students will learn how to perform common statistical analysis in R
Students will learn how to create statistical graphics using the R
syllabus:
Week 1

Course Introduction and an Introduction to R

Week 2

Reading Data and Data Reshaping

Week 3

Writing R Functions and Control Statements

Week 4

Variables, Functions, and Data Types

Week 5

Vectors and Strings

Week 6

Data.frame and Lists

Week 7

Matrices and Arrays

Week 8

Midterm Exam

Week 9

Summary Statistics and Correlation Coefficient

Week 10

T Test and ANOVA

Week 11

Simple and Multiple Regression

Week 12

Logistic Regression

Week 13

Analyzing Longitudinal Data I

Week 14

Analyzing Longitudinal Data II

Week 15

Statistical Graphics

Week 16

Final Exam
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
